name: String Beans In Walnut And Raspberry Vinaigrette
keywords: raspberry vinegar, string beans, walnut, side dish, summer, vegan, vegetarian
recipeIngredient: Coarse salt and freshly ground pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Trim the string beans and steam until tender but firm.

Meanwhile, combine the remaining ingredients to make a dressing. Toss the beans in the dressing while hot and leave at room temperature. Do not refrigerate if possible. Taste the beans again when they have cooled and correct the seasoning.
